message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is too low for this product. I'm willing to come down to $130, which is still a great price for the value you're getting.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I am only able to pay $125.
